name: OS Town Plan Manchester 1:1,056 (1848-50, 49 sheets)
description: Large scale Ordnance Survey town plan of Manchester and Salford. 49 sheets at 1:1,056. Surveyed 1848-50, published 1850-51. Gazetteer of ~9,350 indexed names.
notes:
NLS CC-BY. 49 individual sheets (IDs 231273810 to 231273951).
Not available as pre-built XYZ tiles on S3 (unlike London).
NLS viewer only serves them through their own OpenLayers viewer.

To get Cesium-ready:
1. Open a sheet e.g. https://maps.nls.uk/view/231273810
2. Click Georeference to open AllMaps Editor
3. AllMaps URL pattern: https://editor.allmaps.org/#/georeference?url=https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/{first5}%252F{viewId}/info.json
4. Place 4+ control points to georeference
5. Tiles then served at: https://allmaps.xyz/images/{hash}/{z}/{x}/{y}.png
6. Load that XYZ URL as Cesium imagery layer

IIIF pattern: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/23127%2F{viewId}/info.json
First sheet: 231273810, last: 231273951
